   mask - a boolean indicating whether the click was on the masked (black) or unmasked (non-block) area","defaultValue":{"value":"() => {}","computed":false}},"className":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"<SeeThrough> creates a <div> wrapper around all the contained elements.
